future_plans.title: Dream Honeymoon in Paris
future_plans.description: A romantic week in the City of Love, visiting cafes, museums, and watching sunsets from the Eiffel Tower
details: Dinner at a cozy Montmartre bistro
future_plans.inspiration: We've always dreamed of walking hand in hand through Parisian streets

future_plans.title: Build Our Dream Home
future_plans.description: Design and build a cozy home with a garden where we can grow old together
details: Garden for growing our own vegetables
Home office spaces for both of us
future_plans.inspiration: A place where every corner holds memories of our love

future_plans.title: Learn to Dance Together
future_plans.description: Take ballroom dancing lessons and learn the waltz, tango, and swing
future_plans.inspiration: So we can dance at every celebration for the rest of our lives

future_plans.title: Annual Adventure Tradition
future_plans.description: Take one big adventure together every year to explore new places and create memories
future_plans.inspiration: Life is an adventure best shared with your soulmate

wish_list.title: Matching Promise Rings
wish_list.description: Simple, elegant rings as a symbol of our commitment
wish_list.notes: Something simple but meaningful, maybe with our initials engraved

wish_list.title: Professional Couple Photoshoot
wish_list.description: Capture this beautiful time in our relationship with professional photos
wish_list.notes: Looking for a photographer who specializes in natural, candid shots

wish_list.title: Custom Star Map
wish_list.description: A map of the stars from the night we first said 'I love you'
wish_list.notes: From the night of March 15, 2024 - our special moment

special_dates.title: Monthly Anniversary
special_dates.description: Celebrating the 16th of every month as our mini anniversary
celebration_ideas: Take a walk down memory lane
